root.name: Typingmania 5 Odyssey
root.description: Typingmania 5 Odyssey is a Lyrical Typing Game created by Sight Seeker Studio. SightSeeker Studio created the engine so other people can actually host their own version on their own websites. They don't condone using copyrighted artist's work and they don't take requests. If you want to requests songs, you can contact Tatazilla and he will eventually get to it. Original Website [URL]http://www.sightseekerstudio.com/typingmania/contents/odyssey.html[/URL]
